name: Sticktoons: The Game
description:
How to Play:
- W & D or Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move
- Spacebar to Jump
- Mouse to Aim
- Left-click to Shoot
- Right-click to melee
- Middle-click to throw grenade

Based on the animated series 'Hunter the Top Hat Guy's Sticktoons' on YouTube, Sticktoons: The Game is the first official game that lets you battle with your friends as your favorite Sticktoons characters!

Characters include:
- Hunter the Top Hat Guy
- Huntie the Top Hat Gal
- Leonard & Suzie
- Bobby & Todd
- Jimmy & The Annoying Wolf

We hope you enjoy our debut itch.io game, and thank you for watching Sticktoons!
